long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Having a popup with a list of multiple authorization headers can boost up your development process. 
This Extension was designed to make it as easy as possible to switch between different tokens, without having to open another window for that.

Also, the extension supports the creation of custom search boxes to search for relevant data such as users on your own servers, simply by implementing JS functions, that will be called when searching, and choosing from the results.
